title: Help me decide
body:
I am pretty interested in pokemon SuMo... but I don't have a DS, nor do I have a lot of money... is it worth it if realistically I probably won't get anything else for the DS? I haven't played anything since pearl... but sun and moon is super hype...

Do I pony up the dough or should I just let the hype I have die and not bother? I've watched a lot of lets plays, and if I wanted I could buy both a ds and a copy of sun or moon on a credit card....

This being said.... Is it worth? I don't want buyers remorse but I'd love to play sun or moon.. does it live up to the hype? Is it worth? I don't plan to play competitively, just plan to enjoy it like every other pokemon game..

Help me decide pls
